key.name: receiving-folder
key.summary: The folder received files will be saved to.
key.description: If left empty, the user's home folder will be used.

key.name: use-tray-icon
key.summary: Show a tray icon, and keep the program running even with the window closed

key.name: start-with-window
key.summary: Show the main window at startup

key.name: default-pinned
key.summary: Pin the window (keep above) by default

key.name: ask-for-send-permission
key.summary: Start transfers automatically or require permission
key.description: If true, every transfer initiated must first be approved by the receiving user. If false, transfers start automatically.

key.name: favorites
key.description: These will always be at the top of the user list.

key.name: no-overwrite
key.summary: Abort transfers when the destination files already exist

key.name: keep-permissions
key.summary: Preserve the original user permissions of files being received.

key.name: network-iface
key.summary: Name of network interface the service should use.

key.name: fallback-to-available-iface
key.summary: If the preferred network is unavailable, try to use the default active network, if one exists.

key.name: port
key.summary: Incoming port to use (this needs to be allowed by any firewall)

key.name: show-notifications
key.summary: Display notifications when a new transfer is incoming.

key.name: rpc-thread-pool-size
key.summary: Number of threads to share between all remotes and the server to handle inter-machine communication
key.description: If this is set to 0, a sane value will be used based equal to larger of (number_of_cpu_cores + 4) and 8. It is recommended to set this to at least 8.

key.name: server-thread-pool-size
key.summary: Number of threads to allow the server, for handling incoming rpcs.

key.name: width
key.summary: The saved window width (this is not guaranteed, if the number of remotes changes)

key.name: height
key.summary: The saved window height (this is not guaranteed, if the number of remotes changes)
